title.rendered: Chef Vikas Khanna celebrates birthday with Smile Foundation kids

content.rendered:
Michelin Star Chef Vikas Khanna celebrated his 45th birthday with Smile Foundation kids on t6he sets of Masterchef India season 5. He took the day off to spend quality time with the children.

The chef created a treat for the children by preparing some special flavors of burgers on the occasion of Children’s Day. The kids in turn surprised him with a beautiful cake. The children also gifted him handmade cards which touched his heart. He said, “This is my treasure to cherish. The love these children have given me is the best and only form of money I own today.”
